Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near 35th/Archer. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near 35th/Archer. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Western, Jackson, California, and Madison due to, street blockage at Madison/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Western, Jackson, California, and Madison due to, street blockage at Madison/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.
